display_name: PSG Results: Calculated - RDI in non-supine body position (>= 0% desaturation)
description: missing if studies with problems scoring REM/NREM or if studies scored as sleep/wake or REM sleep time is 0
calculation: rdim0pns = 60*(hrop  + hnrop + carop + canop + oarop + oanop + marop + manrop)/(remepop+nremepop)
